ttp_template:
<group name="active_time_device_priority_failover_reason_failover_state">
High Availability Version: {{VERSION | ORPHRASE}}
Device Priority: {{DEVICE_PRIORITY | ORPHRASE}}
Failover State: {{FAILOVER_STATE | ORPHRASE}}
Peer Device Priority: {{PEER_DEVICE_PRIORITY | ORPHRASE}}
Active Time: {{ACTIVE_TIME | ORPHRASE}}
Standby Ready Time: {{STANDBY_READY_TIME | ORPHRASE}}
Last Failover Event: {{LAST_FAILOVER_EVENT | ORPHRASE}}
Failover Reason: {{FAILOVER_REASON | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
cli_content:
High Availability Version: 1.8
Device Priority: Primary (100)
Failover State: Active
Peer Device Priority: Standby (90)
Peer Failover State: Standby Ready
Active Time: 00:01:12
Standby Ready Time: 00:01:10
Last Failover Event: 2023-10-10 13:45:12
Failover Reason: Primary device restarted
textfsm_template:
Value VERSION (\S+)
Value DEVICE_PRIORITY (\S+ \(\d+\))
Value FAILOVER_STATE (\S+)
Value PEER_DEVICE_PRIORITY (\S+ \(\d+\))
Value PEER_FAILOVER_STATE (\S+)
Value ACTIVE_TIME (\d+:\d+:\d+)
Value STANDBY_READY_TIME (\d+:\d+:\d+)
Value LAST_FAILOVER_EVENT (\d+-\d+-\d+ \d+:\d+:\d+)
Value FAILOVER_REASON (.*)

Start
  ^High\sAvailability\sVersion:\s${VERSION}\s*$$
  ^Device\sPriority:\s${DEVICE_PRIORITY}\s*$$
  ^Failover\sState:\s${FAILOVER_STATE}\s*$$
  ^Peer\sDevice\sPriority:\s${PEER_DEVICE_PRIORITY}\s*$$
  ^Peer\sFailover\sState:\s${PEER_FAILOVER_STATE}\s*$$
  ^Active\sTime:\s${ACTIVE_TIME}\s*$$
  ^Standby\sReady\sTime:\s${STANDBY_READY_TIME}\s*$$
  ^Last\sFailover\sEvent:\s${LAST_FAILOVER_EVENT}\s*$$
  ^Failover\sReason:\s${FAILOVER_REASON}\s*$$ -> Record
